definitions.definition: Any of several pungent Eurasian and North American herbs , of the genus Achillea , used in traditional herbal medicine .
Common yarrow , Achillea millefolium , the type species of the genus.

main_definition: Any of several pungent Eurasian and North American herbs , of the genus Achillea , used in traditional herbal medicine .
secondary_definitions: Common yarrow , Achillea millefolium , the type species of the genus.

definitions.definition: A green woodpecker , of species Picus viridis .

main_definition: ( UK ) A green woodpecker , of species Picus viridis .
